EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1343835366.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Rick, Thanks so much. I will be on the lookout for the I-9. Thanks!Sara From: Rick Abell [mailto:rickabell@att.net] Sent: Monday, July 30, 2012 3:30 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Paul Shahady Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Finally got around to finishing the info. I also mailed the notarized I-9 Form today as well
Cheers
Eric E (Rick) Abell "Some Consultant" Steamboat Springs Services No Answers Left Unquestioned
--- On Fri, 6/29/12, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information To: "Rick Abell" <rickabell@att.net <mailto:rickabell@att.net>> Date: Friday, June 29, 2012, 4:21 PMHi Rick, Our IT has fixed the problem. You should be able to log in now and proceed without issue. Please let me know if you hit and more bumps. Thanks!Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com </mc/compose?to=sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com </mc/compose?to=postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Rick Abell [mailto:rickabell@att.net] <mailto:[mailto:rickabell@att.net]> Sent: Thursday, June 28, 2012 3:36 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Filled out the first form, hit next and then it keeps asking me for my work phone but I do not have one. i entered my home phone but it doesn't like that as it keeps asking me to enter my work phone. I did get to the next page once by some miracle but it said something to the effect the file does not exist.
Using Firefox on Windows Vista.
Computers are dumb.
Cheers
Eric E (Rick) Abell
"Some Consultant"
Steamboat Springs Services No Answers Left Unquestioned
--- On Wed, 6/13/12, sconde@mbopartners.com </mc/compose?to=sconde@mbopartners.com> <sconde@mbopartners.com </mc/compose?to=sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: From: sconde@mbopartners.com </mc/compose?to=sconde@mbopartners.com> <sconde@mbopartners.com </mc/compose?to=sconde@mbopartners.com>> Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information To: rickabell@att.net </mc/compose?to=rickabell@att.net> Date: Wednesday, June 13, 2012, 11:06 AMDear Rick,Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking here <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A4B49FCB5F4F48084F00>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to working with you. Regards, Sara CondeEnrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6028 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171http://www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com%20>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
